meanings.sent1: The metal was oxidable, so it easily rusted in the rain.
meanings.sent2: When exposed to air, the oxidable substance turned a darker color.
meanings.sent3: The oxidable paint on the old car flaked off like crispy potato chips.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was oxidable, slowly wearing away with each passing minute.
meanings.sent5: The wood was so oxidable that it caught fire with just a spark.

meanings.sent1: The fruit was oxidable, quickly spoiling in the warm weather.
meanings.sent2: Leaving the metal unprotected made it oxidable and prone to corrosion.
meanings.sent3: The oxidable banana peel turned brown and mushy in no time.
meanings.sent4: His temper was oxidable, easily flaring up in stressful situations.
meanings.sent5: The fabric was oxidable, fading in color after each wash.
